00043 void QgsAttributeEditor::selectFileName()
00044 {
00045   QPushButton *pb = qobject_cast<QPushButton *>( sender() );
00046   if ( !pb )
00047     return;
00048 
00049   QWidget *hbox = qobject_cast<QWidget *>( pb->parent() );
00050   if ( !hbox )
00051     return;
00052 
00053   QLineEdit *le = hbox->findChild<QLineEdit *>();
00054   if ( !le )
00055     return;
00056 
00057   QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( 0 , tr( "Select a file" ) );
00058   if ( fileName.isNull() )
00059     return;
00060 
00061   le->setText( fileName );
00062 }
00063 
00064 void QgsAttributeEditor::selectDate()
00065 {
00066   QPushButton *pb = qobject_cast<QPushButton *>( sender() );
00067   if ( !pb )
00068     return;
00069 
00070   QWidget *hbox = qobject_cast<QWidget *>( pb->parent() );
00071   if ( !hbox )
00072     return;
00073 
00074   QLineEdit *le = hbox->findChild<QLineEdit *>();
00075   if ( !le )
00076     return;
00077 
00078   QDialog *dlg = new QDialog();
00079   dlg->setWindowTitle( tr( "Select a date" ) );
00080   QVBoxLayout *vl = new QVBoxLayout( dlg );
00081 
00082   QCalendarWidget *cw = new QCalendarWidget( dlg );
00083   cw->setSelectedDate( QDate::fromString( le->text(), Qt::ISODate ) );
00084   vl->addWidget( cw );
00085 
00086   QDialogButtonBox *buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox( dlg );
00087   buttonBox->addButton( QDialogButtonBox::Ok );
00088   buttonBox->addButton( QDialogButtonBox::Cancel );
00089   vl->addWidget( buttonBox );
00090 
00091   connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( accepted() ), dlg, SLOT( accept() ) );
00092   connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( rejected() ), dlg, SLOT( reject() ) );
00093 
00094   if ( dlg->exec() == QDialog::Accepted )
00095   {
00096     le->setText( cw->selectedDate().toString( Qt::ISODate ) );
00097   }
00098 }

00100 QComboBox *QgsAttributeEditor::comboBox( QWidget *editor, QWidget *parent )
00101 {
00102   QComboBox *cb = NULL;
00103   if ( editor )
00104     cb = qobject_cast<QComboBox *>( editor );
00105   else
00106     cb = new QComboBox( parent );
00107 
00108   return cb;
00109 }

00111 QWidget *QgsAttributeEditor::createAttributeEditor( QWidget *parent, QWidget *editor, QgsVectorLayer *vl, int idx, const QVariant &value )
00112 {
00113   if ( !vl )
00114     return NULL;
00115 
00116   QWidget *myWidget = NULL;
00117   QgsVectorLayer::EditType editType = vl->editType( idx );
00118   const QgsField &field = vl->pendingFields()[idx];
00119   QVariant::Type myFieldType = field.type();
00120 
00121   switch ( editType )
00122   {
00123     case QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValues:
00124     {
00125       QList<QVariant> values;
00126       vl->dataProvider()->uniqueValues( idx, values );
00127 
00128       QComboBox *cb = comboBox( editor, parent );
00129       if ( cb )
00130       {
00131         cb->setEditable( false );
00132 
00133         for ( QList<QVariant>::iterator it = values.begin(); it != values.end(); it++ )
00134           cb->addItem( it->toString(), it->toString() );
00135 
00136         myWidget = cb;
00137       }
00138     }
00139     break;
00140 
00141     case QgsVectorLayer::Enumeration:
00142     {
00143       QStringList enumValues;
00144       vl->dataProvider()->enumValues( idx, enumValues );
00145 
00146       QComboBox *cb = comboBox( editor, parent );
00147       if ( cb )
00148       {
00149         QStringList::const_iterator s_it = enumValues.constBegin();
00150         for ( ; s_it != enumValues.constEnd(); ++s_it )
00151         {
00152           cb->addItem( *s_it, *s_it );
00153         }
00154 
00155         myWidget = cb;
00156       }
00157     }
00158     break;
00159 
00160     case QgsVectorLayer::ValueMap:
00161     {
00162       const QMap<QString, QVariant> &map = vl->valueMap( idx );
00163 
00164       QComboBox *cb = comboBox( editor, parent );
00165       if ( cb )
00166       {
00167         for ( QMap<QString, QVariant>::const_iterator it = map.begin(); it != map.end(); it++ )
00168         {
00169           cb->addItem( it.key(), it.value() );
00170         }
00171 
00172         myWidget = cb;
00173       }
00174     }
00175     break;
00176 
00177     case QgsVectorLayer::Classification:
00178     {
00179       QMap<QString, QString> classes;
00180 
00181       const QgsUniqueValueRenderer *uvr = dynamic_cast<const QgsUniqueValueRenderer *>( vl->renderer() );
00182       if ( uvr )
00183       {
00184         const QList<QgsSymbol *> symbols = uvr->symbols();
00185 
00186         for ( int i = 0; i < symbols.size(); i++ )
00187         {
00188           QString label = symbols[i]->label();
00189           QString name = symbols[i]->lowerValue();
00190 
00191           if ( label == "" )
00192             label = name;
00193 
00194           classes.insert( name, label );
00195         }
00196       }
00197 
00198       const QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2 *csr = dynamic_cast<const QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2 *>( vl->rendererV2() );
00199       if ( csr )
00200       {
00201         const QgsCategoryList &categories = (( QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2 * )csr )->categories(); // FIXME: QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::categories() should be const
00202         for ( int i = 0; i < categories.size(); i++ )
00203         {
00204           QString label = categories[i].label();
00205           QString value = categories[i].value().toString();
00206           if ( label.isEmpty() )
00207             label = value;
00208           classes.insert( value, label );
00209         }
00210       }
00211 
00212       QComboBox *cb = comboBox( editor, parent );
00213       if ( cb )
00214       {
00215         for ( QMap<QString, QString>::const_iterator it = classes.begin(); it != classes.end(); it++ )
00216         {
00217           cb->addItem( it.value(), it.key() );
00218         }
00219 
00220         myWidget = cb;
00221       }
00222     }
00223     break;
00224 
00225 
00226     case QgsVectorLayer::DialRange:
00227     case QgsVectorLayer::SliderRange:
00228     case QgsVectorLayer::EditRange:
00229     {
00230       if ( myFieldType == QVariant::Int )
00231       {
00232         int min = vl->range( idx ).mMin.toInt();
00233         int max = vl->range( idx ).mMax.toInt();
00234         int step = vl->range( idx ).mStep.toInt();
00235 
00236         if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::EditRange )
00237         {
00238           QSpinBox *sb = NULL;
00239 
00240           if ( editor )
00241             sb = qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>( editor );
00242           else
00243             sb = new QSpinBox( parent );
00244 
00245           if ( sb )
00246           {
00247             sb->setRange( min, max );
00248             sb->setSingleStep( step );
00249 
00250             myWidget = sb;
00251           }
00252         }
00253         else
00254         {
00255           QAbstractSlider *sl = NULL;
00256 
00257           if ( editor )
00258           {
00259             sl = qobject_cast<QAbstractSlider*>( editor );
00260           }
00261           else if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::DialRange )
00262           {
00263             sl = new QDial( parent );
00264           }
00265           else
00266           {
00267             sl = new QSlider( Qt::Horizontal, parent );
00268           }
00269 
00270           if ( sl )
00271           {
00272             sl->setRange( min, max );
00273             sl->setSingleStep( step );
00274 
00275             myWidget = sl;
00276           }
00277         }
00278         break;
00279       }
00280       else if ( myFieldType == QVariant::Double )
00281       {
00282         QDoubleSpinBox *dsb = NULL;
00283         if ( editor )
00284           dsb = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox*>( editor );
00285         else
00286           dsb = new QDoubleSpinBox( parent );
00287 
00288         if ( dsb )
00289         {
00290           double min = vl->range( idx ).mMin.toDouble();
00291           double max = vl->range( idx ).mMax.toDouble();
00292           double step = vl->range( idx ).mStep.toDouble();
00293 
00294           dsb->setRange( min, max );
00295           dsb->setSingleStep( step );
00296 
00297           myWidget = dsb;
00298         }
00299         break;
00300       }
00301     }
00302 
00303     case QgsVectorLayer::CheckBox:
00304     {
00305       QCheckBox *cb = NULL;
00306       if ( editor )
00307         cb = qobject_cast<QCheckBox*>( editor );
00308       else
00309         cb = new QCheckBox( parent );
00310 
00311       if ( cb )
00312       {
00313         myWidget = cb;
00314         break;
00315       }
00316     }
00317 
00318     // fall-through
00319 
00320     case QgsVectorLayer::LineEdit:
00321     case QgsVectorLayer::TextEdit:
00322     case QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValuesEditable:
00323     case QgsVectorLayer::Immutable:
00324     {
00325       QLineEdit *le = NULL;
00326       QTextEdit *te = NULL;
00327       QPlainTextEdit *pte = NULL;
00328 
00329       if ( editor )
00330       {
00331         le = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>( editor );
00332         te = qobject_cast<QTextEdit *>( editor );
00333         pte = qobject_cast<QPlainTextEdit *>( editor );
00334       }
00335       else if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::TextEdit )
00336       {
00337         pte = new QPlainTextEdit( parent );
00338       }
00339       else
00340       {
00341         le = new QLineEdit( parent );
00342       }
00343 
00344       if ( le )
00345       {
00346 
00347         if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValuesEditable )
00348         {
00349           QList<QVariant> values;
00350           vl->dataProvider()->uniqueValues( idx, values );
00351 
00352           QStringList svalues;
00353           for ( QList<QVariant>::const_iterator it = values.begin(); it != values.end(); it++ )
00354             svalues << it->toString();
00355 
00356           QCompleter *c = new QCompleter( svalues );
00357           c->setCompletionMode( QCompleter::PopupCompletion );
00358           le->setCompleter( c );
00359         }
00360 
00361         le->setValidator( new QgsFieldValidator( le, field ) );
00362         myWidget = le;
00363       }
00364 
00365       if ( te )
00366       {
00367         te->setAcceptRichText( true );
00368         myWidget = te;
00369       }
00370 
00371       if ( pte )
00372       {
00373         myWidget = pte;
00374       }
00375 
00376       if ( myWidget )
00377       {
00378         myWidget->setDisabled( editType == QgsVectorLayer::Immutable );
00379       }
00380     }
00381     break;
00382 
00383     case QgsVectorLayer::Hidden:
00384       myWidget = NULL;
00385       break;
00386 
00387     case QgsVectorLayer::FileName:
00388     case QgsVectorLayer::Calendar:
00389     {
00390       QPushButton *pb = NULL;
00391       QLineEdit *le = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>( editor );
00392       if ( le )
00393       {
00394         if ( le )
00395           myWidget = le;
00396 
00397         if ( editor->parent() )
00398         {
00399           pb = editor->parent()->findChild<QPushButton *>();
00400         }
00401       }
00402       else
00403       {
00404         le = new QLineEdit();
00405 
00406         pb = new QPushButton( tr( "..." ) );
00407 
00408         QHBoxLayout *hbl = new QHBoxLayout();
00409         hbl->addWidget( le );
00410         hbl->addWidget( pb );
00411 
00412         myWidget = new QWidget( parent );
00413         myWidget->setBackgroundRole( QPalette::Window );
00414         myWidget->setAutoFillBackground( true );
00415         myWidget->setLayout( hbl );
00416       }
00417 
00418       if ( pb )
00419       {
00420         if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::FileName )
00421           connect( pb, SIGNAL( clicked() ), new QgsAttributeEditor( pb ), SLOT( selectFileName() ) );
00422         if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::Calendar )
00423           connect( pb, SIGNAL( clicked() ), new QgsAttributeEditor( pb ), SLOT( selectDate() ) );
00424       }
00425     }
00426     break;
00427   }
00428 
00429   setValue( myWidget, vl, idx, value );
00430 
00431   return myWidget;
00432 }
00433 
00434 bool QgsAttributeEditor::retrieveValue( QWidget *widget, QgsVectorLayer *vl, int idx, QVariant &value )
00435 {
00436   if ( !widget )
00437     return false;
00438 
00439   const QgsField &theField = vl->pendingFields()[idx];
00440   QgsVectorLayer::EditType editType = vl->editType( idx );
00441   bool modified = false;
00442   QString text;
00443 
00444   QSettings settings;
00445   QString nullValue = settings.value( "qgis/nullValue", "NULL" ).toString();
00446 
00447   QLineEdit *le = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>( widget );
00448   if ( le )
00449   {
00450     text = le->text();
00451     modified = le->isModified();
00452     if ( text == nullValue )
00453     {
00454       text = QString::null;
00455     }
00456   }
00457 
00458   QTextEdit *te = qobject_cast<QTextEdit *>( widget );
00459   if ( te )
00460   {
00461     text = te->toHtml();
00462     modified = te->document()->isModified();
00463     if ( text == nullValue )
00464     {
00465       text = QString::null;
00466     }
00467   }
00468 
00469   QPlainTextEdit *pte = qobject_cast<QPlainTextEdit *>( widget );
00470   if ( pte )
00471   {
00472     text = pte->toPlainText();
00473     modified = pte->document()->isModified();
00474     if ( text == nullValue )
00475     {
00476       text = QString::null;
00477     }
00478   }
00479 
00480   QComboBox *cb = qobject_cast<QComboBox *>( widget );
00481   if ( cb )
00482   {
00483     if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValues ||
00484          editType == QgsVectorLayer::ValueMap ||
00485          editType == QgsVectorLayer::Classification )
00486     {
00487       text = cb->itemData( cb->currentIndex() ).toString();
00488       if ( text == nullValue )
00489       {
00490         text = QString::null;
00491       }
00492     }
00493     else
00494     {
00495       text = cb->currentText();
00496     }
00497     modified = true;
00498   }
00499 
00500   QSpinBox *sb = qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>( widget );
00501   if ( sb )
00502   {
00503     text = QString::number( sb->value() );
00504   }
00505 
00506   QAbstractSlider *slider = qobject_cast<QAbstractSlider *>( widget );
00507   if ( slider )
00508   {
00509     text = QString::number( slider->value() );
00510   }
00511 
00512   QDoubleSpinBox *dsb = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox *>( widget );
00513   if ( dsb )
00514   {
00515     text = QString::number( dsb->value() );
00516   }
00517 
00518   QCheckBox *ckb = qobject_cast<QCheckBox *>( widget );
00519   if ( ckb )
00520   {
00521     QPair<QString, QString> states = vl->checkedState( idx );
00522     text = ckb->isChecked() ? states.first : states.second;
00523   }
00524 
00525   QCalendarWidget *cw = qobject_cast<QCalendarWidget *>( widget );
00526   if ( cw )
00527   {
00528     text = cw->selectedDate().toString();
00529   }
00530 
00531   le = widget->findChild<QLineEdit *>();
00532   if ( le )
00533   {
00534     text = le->text();
00535   }
00536 
00537   switch ( theField.type() )
00538   {
00539     case QVariant::Int:
00540     {
00541       bool ok;
00542       int myIntValue = text.toInt( &ok );
00543       if ( ok && !text.isEmpty() )
00544       {
00545         value = QVariant( myIntValue );
00546         modified = true;
00547       }
00548       else if ( modified )
00549       {
00550         value = QVariant();
00551       }
00552     }
00553     break;
00554     case QVariant::LongLong:
00555     {
00556       bool ok;
00557       qlonglong myLongValue = text.toLong( &ok );
00558       if ( ok && !text.isEmpty() )
00559       {
00560         value = QVariant( myLongValue );
00561         modified = true;
00562       }
00563       else if ( modified )
00564       {
00565         value = QVariant();
00566       }
00567     }
00568     case QVariant::Double:
00569     {
00570       bool ok;
00571       double myDblValue = text.toDouble( &ok );
00572       if ( ok && !text.isEmpty() )
00573       {
00574         value = QVariant( myDblValue );
00575         modified = true;
00576       }
00577       else if ( modified )
00578       {
00579         value = QVariant();
00580       }
00581     }
00582     break;
00583     case QVariant::Date:
00584     {
00585       QDate myDateValue = QDate::fromString( text, Qt::ISODate );
00586       if ( myDateValue.isValid() && !text.isEmpty() )
00587       {
00588         value = myDateValue;
00589         modified = true;
00590       }
00591       else if ( modified )
00592       {
00593         value = QVariant();
00594       }
00595     }
00596     break;
00597     default: //string
00598       modified = true;
00599       value = QVariant( text );
00600       break;
00601   }
00602 
00603   return modified;
00604 }
00605 
00606 bool QgsAttributeEditor::setValue( QWidget *editor, QgsVectorLayer *vl, int idx, const QVariant &value )
00607 {
00608   if ( !editor )
00609     return false;
00610 
00611   QgsVectorLayer::EditType editType = vl->editType( idx );
00612   const QgsField &field = vl->pendingFields()[idx];
00613   QVariant::Type myFieldType = field.type();
00614 
00615   QSettings settings;
00616   QString nullValue = settings.value( "qgis/nullValue", "NULL" ).toString();
00617 
00618   switch ( editType )
00619   {
00620     case QgsVectorLayer::Classification:
00621     case QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValues:
00622     case QgsVectorLayer::Enumeration:
00623     case QgsVectorLayer::ValueMap:
00624     {
00625       QVariant v = value;
00626       QComboBox *cb = qobject_cast<QComboBox *>( editor );
00627       if ( cb == NULL )
00628         return false;
00629 
00630       if ( v.isNull() )
00631       {
00632         v = nullValue;
00633       }
00634 
00635       int idx = cb->findData( v );
00636       if ( idx < 0 )
00637         return false;
00638 
00639       cb->setCurrentIndex( idx );
00640     }
00641     break;
00642 
00643     case QgsVectorLayer::DialRange:
00644     case QgsVectorLayer::SliderRange:
00645     case QgsVectorLayer::EditRange:
00646     {
00647       if ( myFieldType == QVariant::Int )
00648       {
00649         if ( editType == QgsVectorLayer::EditRange )
00650         {
00651           QSpinBox *sb = qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>( editor );
00652           if ( sb == NULL )
00653             return false;
00654           sb->setValue( value.toInt() );
00655         }
00656         else
00657         {
00658           QAbstractSlider *sl = qobject_cast<QAbstractSlider *>( editor );
00659           if ( sl == NULL )
00660             return false;
00661           sl->setValue( value.toInt() );
00662         }
00663         break;
00664       }
00665       else if ( myFieldType == QVariant::Double )
00666       {
00667         QDoubleSpinBox *dsb = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox *>( editor );
00668         if ( dsb == NULL )
00669           return false;
00670         dsb->setValue( value.toDouble() );
00671       }
00672     }
00673 
00674     case QgsVectorLayer::CheckBox:
00675     {
00676       QCheckBox *cb = qobject_cast<QCheckBox *>( editor );
00677       if ( cb )
00678       {
00679         QPair<QString, QString> states = vl->checkedState( idx );
00680         cb->setChecked( value == states.first );
00681         break;
00682       }
00683     }
00684 
00685     // fall-through
00686 
00687     case QgsVectorLayer::LineEdit:
00688     case QgsVectorLayer::UniqueValuesEditable:
00689     case QgsVectorLayer::Immutable:
00690     default:
00691     {
00692       QLineEdit *le = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>( editor );
00693       QTextEdit *te = qobject_cast<QTextEdit *>( editor );
00694       QPlainTextEdit *pte = qobject_cast<QPlainTextEdit *>( editor );
00695       if ( !le && !te && !pte )
00696         return false;
00697 
00698       QString text;
00699       if ( value.isNull() )
00700         if ( myFieldType == QVariant::Int || myFieldType == QVariant::Double || myFieldType == QVariant::LongLong )
00701           text = "";
00702         else
00703           text = nullValue;
00704       else
00705         text = value.toString();
00706 
00707       if ( le )
00708         le->setText( text );
00709       if ( te )
00710         te->setHtml( text );
00711       if ( pte )
00712         pte->setPlainText( text );
00713     }
00714     break;
00715 
00716     case QgsVectorLayer::FileName:
00717     case QgsVectorLayer::Calendar:
00718     {
00719       QLineEdit* le = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>( editor );
00720       if( !le )
00721       {
00722         le = editor->findChild<QLineEdit *>();
00723       }
00724       if ( !le )
00725       {
00726         return false;
00727       }
00728       le->setText( value.toString() );
00729     }
00730     break;
00731   }
00732 
00733   return true;
00734 }
